QuestData.Title: Academic Assistance
QuestData.Description:
$n! I've made a breakthrough with tha Winterpelt dialect. Ya helped get tha ball rollin' on this, so I felt like I ought ta keep ya apprised of the situation.
Meet me in Theron's Watch and I'll tell ya all about it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Sonova Snowden in Theron's Watch.
